title: Cummins to miss 2025 Major League Cricket season
body:
Australia captain Pat Cummins has decided to skip the 2025 season of Major League Cricket in the United States.

Cummins, 31, signed a four-year contract to play for San Francisco Unicorns in the American franchise tournament until 2027 in June last year.

He played six MLC matches for the Unicorns in the 2024 season and took four wickets at an average of 52.75.

Cummins is currently recovering from an ankle injury and has already been ruled out of Australia's squad for the Champions Trophy.

"Pat Cummins is unavailable to re-sign for the Unicorns in 2025 due to international commitments and workload management," said a statement from the Unicorns.

"The fast bowler has expressed his excitement to play in future Major League Cricket seasons, as his international schedule permits."

Australia's next assignment after the tournament in Pakistan is the World Test Championship final at Lord's which starts on 11 June.

They will then travel to the Caribbean to play three Tests and five T20 internationals against West Indies in June and July which is likely to clash with the third edition of MLC.
summary:
* Australia captain Pat Cummins will skip the 2025 season of Major League Cricket (MLC) in the United States due to international commitments and workload management.
* Cummins had signed a four-year contract with San Francisco Unicorns in June last year, playing six matches in the 2024 season and taking four wickets at an average of 52.75.
* The 2025 season of MLC is likely to clash with Australia's tour of the Caribbean, where they will play three Tests and five T20 internationals against West Indies in June and July.
* Cummins has expressed his excitement to play in future MLC seasons when his international schedule permits.

title: MI New York Team MLC 2025 Squad, Players list, Captain, Coach | MINY Squads Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025
body:
Find the MI New York MLC T20 2025 Squad, Players list, Captain, Coach along with Administration and support staff only on Indiacricketschedule.com

MI New York Team MLC 2025 Squad, Players list, Captain - The MI New York team also know as (MINY Team 2025, MI New York MLC 2025 Team) is a Twenty20 franchise cricket team plays in the Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025. The MINY franchise team is based in New York City, New York, United States.

MI New York team is owned by Indiawin Sports. The MINY team will be captained by Kieron Pollard and coached by Robin Peterson.

Major League Cricket (MLC) (also known as MLC 2025, MLC 2025 USA T20) is an the top-level professional Twenty20 cricket league Tournament in United States, organized by the American Cricket Enterprises (ACE).

We are shared MI New York 2025 Squad, Players list, Captain for the Major League Cricket season.
